name: Loot and Found
description:
Manage the lost and found office of a dungeon!

When adventurers die, they usually leave all of their equipments and stuff back in the dungeon. Well, as the entity in charge of the "Loot and Found" point, you have to return the abandoned items back to their rightful owners. Make sure to give them back exactly what they want, and make a pretty penny while you're at it to improve your services.

But be careful! Should you return the wrong items to the wrong owners, adventures will soon grow frustrated, and will find some other dungeon to raid. Or where to die.

Controls

Arrow keys or WASD to move, space to interact.

If the embeded game doesn't work, you can download below!

Credits

Art by Ming Rang Bai & Curzio Ferrara

Sound Design by Andrew Hind

Programming by Viki Johnson & Mokhirbek Salimboev

Global Game Jam Link

https://globalgamejam.org/2021/games/wardrobe-keeper-4
